dublin_core.dcvalue: Childbearing women are increasingly engaging with social media and technology The use of apps for pregnancy and childbirth advice is a new approach to maternity provision and has potential to impact upon midwifery Apps are ideally placed to provide opportunities for women to access information however there are concerns about the quality of mobile app data in relation to evidence based midwifery This discussion paper presents a general overview of the use of apps as an information resource and provides a platform for debate about their position in midwifery care
Women's engagement with mobile device applications in pregnancy and childbirth.
